text.div:
SHR ExceptionValueCS CodeSystem

Reasons that a value associated with a test or other finding is missing. Includes all codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/data-absent-reason version 3.3.0 and additional codes covering other missing value circumstances.

name: ExceptionValueCS
title: SHR ExceptionValueCS CodeSystem
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative
description: Reasons that a value associated with a test or other finding is missing. Includes all codes from 	http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/data-absent-reason version 3.3.0 and additional codes covering other missing value circumstances.

concept.display: Unknown: The value is not known.
concept.definition: Unknown: The value is not known.

concept.display: Asked But Unknown: The source human does not know the value.
concept.definition: Asked But Unknown: The source human does not know the value.

concept.display: Temporarily Unknown: There is reason to expect (from the workflow) that the value may become known.
concept.definition: Temporarily Unknown: There is reason to expect (from the workflow) that the value may become known.

concept.display: Not Asked: The workflow didn't lead to this value being known.
concept.definition: Not Asked: The workflow didn't lead to this value being known.

concept.display: Asked But Declined: The source was asked but declined to answer.
concept.definition: Asked But Declined: The source was asked but declined to answer.

concept.display: Masked: The information is not available due to security, privacy or related reasons.
concept.definition: Masked: The information is not available due to security, privacy or related reasons.

concept.display: Not Applicable: There is no proper value for this element (e.g. last menstrual period for a male)
concept.definition: Not Applicable: There is no proper value for this element (e.g. last menstrual period for a male)

concept.display: Unsupported: The source system wasn't capable of supporting this element.
concept.definition: Unsupported: The source system wasn't capable of supporting this element.

concept.display: As Text: The content of the data is represented in the resource narrative.
concept.definition: As Text: The content of the data is represented in the resource narrative.

concept.display: Error: Some system or workflow process error means that the information is not available.
concept.definition: Error: Some system or workflow process error means that the information is not available.

concept.display: Not a Number (NaN): The numeric value is undefined or unrepresentable due to a floating point processing error.
concept.definition: Not a Number (NaN): The numeric value is undefined or unrepresentable due to a floating point processing error.

concept.display: Negative Infinity (NINF): The numeric value is excessively low and unrepresentable due to a floating point processing error.
concept.definition: Negative Infinity (NINF): The numeric value is excessively low and unrepresentable due to a floating point processing error.

concept.display: Positive Infinity (PINF): The numeric value is excessively high and unrepresentable due to a floating point processing error.
concept.definition: Positive Infinity (PINF): The numeric value is excessively high and unrepresentable due to a floating point processing error.

concept.display: Not Performed: The value is not available because the observation procedure  (test, etc.) was not performed.
concept.definition: Not Performed: The value is not available because the observation procedure  (test, etc.) was not performed.

concept.display: Not Permitted: The value is not permitted in this context (e.g. due to profiles, or the base data types)
concept.definition: Not Permitted: The value is not permitted in this context (e.g. due to profiles, or the base data types)

concept.display: The value cannot be determined, for some unspecified reason.
concept.definition: The value cannot be determined, for some unspecified reason.

concept.display: The reason the information is not present is not known.
concept.definition: The reason the information is not present is not known.

concept.display: The answer is missing because nothing of a type of thing is known to exists, e.g., the siblings of an only child. Also use this code to represent a 'none of the above' answer
concept.definition: The answer is missing because nothing of a type of thing is known to exists, e.g., the siblings of an only child. Also use this code to represent a 'none of the above' answer

concept.display: Missing due to a problem collecting, identifying, or locating the specimen, including patient refusal or unable to provide specimen
concept.definition: Missing due to a problem collecting, identifying, or locating the specimen, including patient refusal or unable to provide specimen

concept.display: Missing due to a problem with the specimen, e.g. inadequate specimen, contamination, clotting, improper tube type, improper storage, too small, etc.
concept.definition: Missing due to a problem with the specimen, e.g. inadequate specimen, contamination, clotting, improper tube type, improper storage, too small, etc.

concept.display: Missing due to instrument malfunction.
concept.definition: Missing due to instrument malfunction.
